metadata.title: CVE-2016-7175 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
epan/dissectors/packet-qnet6.c in the QNX6 QNET dissector in Wireshark 2.xbefore 2.0.6 mishandles MAC address data, which allows remote attackers tocause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read and application crash) via acrafted packet.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7175` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwireshark-data - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu14.04.1
libwireshark11 - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu14.04.1
libwiretap8 - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu14.04.1
libwscodecs2 - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu14.04.1
libwsutil9 - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu14.04.1
tshark - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu14.04.1
wireshark - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu14.04.1
wireshark-common - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu14.04.1
wireshark-gtk - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu14.04.1
wireshark-qt - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wireshark package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.6.3-1~ubuntu14.04.1').
